title: Bluetip, 2 albums and 1 e.p.
description:
Bluetip was a rock band from Washington, D.C. It was formed in 1995 by ex-members of Swiz, and released three albums and a number of singles before splitting up in 2001.

Bluetip\&#039;s music is a fairly accessible brand of \&#039;post-hardcore\&#039; punk rock, but without the bleak introspection of many of their Dischord labelmates. Jason Farrell\&#039;s lyrics are quite often humorous and self-mocking, and there is a notable absence of political grandstanding.

After Bluetip split up, Jason Farrell formed a new band, Retisonic.

Two albums, Join Us and Polymer, and on e.p, Hot (-) Fast (+) Union ripped in MP3 with covers ripped through iTunes 7.6.1 at 256 bit rate.
